name: places/ChIJGYBgbfbzwokR41qnZ_8WQxM
formattedAddress: 241 Sherman Ave, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 241 Sherman Ave, New York, NY 10034-2504, USA

editorialSummary.text: Relaxed, family-run bakery featuring special-occasion Dominican cakes, plus cookies & pastries.

originalText.text: I ordered a dulce de leche cake with decorations at that  and they made it a different flavor as you can see from the photo from what I had asked smh and they have the worst customer service telling me to bring the cake back for an exchange when I live 2 hours away. I even confirmed when I picked up the cake that it was the correct flavor and the lady assured me it was. The birthday person is allergic to guava and was unable to eat her own birthday cake. Super disappointed as I order from here all the time and expect more from them!

originalText.text:
Very disappointed. We placed an order online and the cake was dry, hard and it tasted a few days old. The cake was $90 dollars and it only had one line of filling. Not worth the price. This was to expensive for what we got. We are never buying from this place again.

NO COMPRE EN ESTE LUGAR! Muy mala calidad y muy caro para lo que recibes.

text.text:
Very disappointed. We placed an order online and the cake was dry, hard and it tasted a few days old. The cake was $90 dollars and it only had one line of filling. Not worth the price. This was to expensive for what we got. We are never buying from this place again.

NO COMPRE EN ESTE LUGAR! Muy mala calidad y muy caro para lo que recibes.

originalText.text: Another family favorite! We have been ordering our cakes for over 10 years at this location. To be honest, I would not go to another Dominican cake shop as I only know the best from this bakery. Not only do they do the traditional cake, but they do custom order as well for graduations and the like. Just make sure to order in person! They also have smaller bakery items and empanadas for sale as well.

text.text: Another family favorite! We have been ordering our cakes for over 10 years at this location. To be honest, I would not go to another Dominican cake shop as I only know the best from this bakery. Not only do they do the traditional cake, but they do custom order as well for graduations and the like. Just make sure to order in person! They also have smaller bakery items and empanadas for sale as well.

originalText.text: Real Dominican cake. Always moist. Always on point. Always on brand. Just the right amount of sweetness. Every one Always enjoys it. I know you have your Dominican cake lady but if she's unavailable one day don't think about it, just go here.

text.text: Real Dominican cake. Always moist. Always on point. Always on brand. Just the right amount of sweetness. Every one Always enjoys it. I know you have your Dominican cake lady but if she's unavailable one day don't think about it, just go here.

originalText.text: Very disappointed. Me & my family have placed numerous orders from here. I placed an order for picadera for my baby shower on October 4th. I paid in full over the phone & I picked up the order on October 6th. When I got to the event I was distributing the patelitos & quipes on to different plates to put some on each table. When I got to the bottom of the tray, I noticed there was a dead roach in there. I quickly threw all the patelitos & quipes back in & threw away the tray, because it’s common sense that I’m not going to keep a tray of food with a dead rodent in it. Mind you it was already 10pm so I couldn’t call them since they were already closed. I decided to call them the next day in the afternoon & spoke to management. Lady was very unwilling to help nor was accommodating. She tried to say that they don’t have roaches there so it could have crawled in after I picked it up. I reiterated that the trays stood completely closed entire time & were not opened until event. Also, of course they are not going to admit to having roaches. You can be the cleanest & still have roaches especially being in NYC. Lady was unapologetic & had an attitude the entire time. She stated there was nothing they can do since I threw away the tray & didn’t bring it back to them as proof. I advised I had picture proof & would be posting a bad review online since she was so unwilling to help. She stated she would just comment back & negate what I said. Very unprofessional, bad customer service, dirty, & would never order again.
